itemDescription: British Roman Catholic auxiliary bishop (Archdiocese of Southwark)

wikipedia_page.main: Paul Joseph Hendricks (born 18 March 1956) is an Auxiliary Roman Catholic bishop of the Archdiocese of Southwark and Titular Bishop of Rosemarkie.

response: South West Pastoral Area (Area Bishop: The Right Reverend Paul Hendricks): 64 parishes

As of 10 June 2010, there were three auxiliary bishops: Patrick Lynch SS.CC., titular bishop of Castrum; and Paul Hendricks, titular Bishop of Ross and Cromarty; Paul Mason, titular Bishop of Skálaholt. These bishops have particular pastoral responsibility in South East London, South West London and Kent respectively.
| 30 years of service as Parish Accountant, and other services, to St. Elphege's Church, Wallington, Surrey, England. The medal was presented by Bishop Paul Hendricks.
